title: sessionStorage
description: The `sessionStorage` JS browser API object provides access to the session storage mechanism, which allows for storing key-value pairs in a web browser that are cleared when the page session ends.
content: The browser API object that allows storing key-value pairs in the browser for the duration of the page session. Data stored in `sessionStorage` is available while the page is open in the current tab or window and persists through page reloads, but is cleared when the tab or window is closed.
